import { Component } from "@angular/core"; import { TranslateService } from "@ngx-translate/core"; import uk from "src/assets/i18n/uk.json"; @Component({ selector: "app-footer", templateUrl: "./footer.component.html", styleUrls: ["./footer.component.css"], }) export class FooterComponent { constructor(private translate: TranslateService) {} changeLanguage(event: any) { const lang = event.target.value; this.translate.use(lang); } }
